text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Also from Pew:
73% say "the worst is yet to come" re coronavirus.
76% say economy is "fair" or "poor"
63% say Trump has probably/definitely done illegal things
70% say Trump has probably/definitely done unethical things
73% say they're confident in state and local officials
